short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert text cases and manage your text with various options like Sentence case, UPPER CASE, lower case, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Case Convert Extension - a powerful and user-friendly tool designed to help you transform text with ease. Whether you're a developer, writer, or just someone who frequently deals with text, this extension offers a variety of options to convert text cases and enhance your workflow.
